title.jp: Flight Night

synopsis: While onboard the airship, the Tristan, Abel gets involved in a deadly hijacking.

title.jp: Witch Hunt

synopsis: Abel and Tres encounter a little girl named Elise Wasmeyer, who has telepathic powers and the ability to take over people's minds. Due to her powers, she has become a target of the vampires.

title.jp: The Star of Sorrow I: City of Blood

synopsis: Ishtvan is a city located between the Holy See in the West, and the Great Empire in the East which is under the rule of Count Gyula. Abel, who is sent there to find the "Star", meets a troubled Sister Esther Blanchett.

title.jp: The Star of Sorrow II: Hunter's Banquet

synopsis: Abel and Esther are captured by Count Gyula, and they learn about Gyula's plans for revenge using the "Star of Sorrow".

title.jp: Yesterday, Today and Tomorrow

synopsis: Father Abel Nightroad escorts Sister Esther Blanchett to the Vatican in Rome, where she meets the other members of AX including Lady Caterina Sforza and The Pope (Alessandro XVIII).

title.jp: Sword Dancer

synopsis: A murder on holy ground has taken place in Amsterdam, and Lady Caterina sends in the mysterious Father Hugue de Watteau, also known as "Sword Dancer", to investigate.

title.jp: Never Land

synopsis: When ships off the coast of Albion are attacked by what appear to be vampire fairies, Abel seeks out an old comrade, Father Leon Garcia - a former AX member now doing hard time, to help him investigate.

title.jp: Silent Noise

synopsis: After the unexplained collapse of the National Palace in Barcelona, Spain, Father Abel and Sister Noelle are sent to Barcelona to discern what the cause is.

title.jp: Overcount I: The Belfry of Downfall

synopsis: Though grief stricken by the events in Barcelona, the agents of AX scramble to prevent the Rosenkreuz order from carrying out their plan to destroy Rome with the Silent Noise device.

title.jp: Overcount II: Lucifer's Choice

synopsis: Plans to use "The Silent Noise", a destructive sound-wave device, to destroy Rome are underway. Lady Caterina is held under house arrest for her suspicion of Archbishop D'Este.

title.jp: From the Empire

synopsis: In Venice, Abel teams up with an agent of the Empire, Astharoshe Asran, to hunt down a vampire mass murderer of humans, Enderles Kudza. But, Astharoshe has a personal grudge against Enderles and a great deal of contempt for what she regards as Terran interference.

title.jp: The Iblis I: Evening Visitors

synopsis: Rumors of a possible assassination attempt on Lady Caterina are proven true when a fire occurs near the room she is staying in. At the same time, a vampire, known as Ion Fortuna, an Imperial Messenger and the Earl of Memphis, attempts to deliver a message to Lady Caterina.

title.jp: The Iblis II: Betrayal Blaze

synopsis: Sister Esther, Ion and Radu flee from the execution squad, in an attempt to meet with Lady Caterina. Father Abel and Sister Esther try to help Ion and Radu escape, but Radu betrays them.

title.jp: The Ibils III: A Mark of Sinner

synopsis: Dietrich, the Puppet Master, takes control of the Inquisition air ships and uses them to attack the city. He also sends more assassins to attack Lady Caterina. Meanwhile, Abel, Esther, Ion and Petros race through the city to talk to Caterina and evade Radu.

title.jp: The Night Lords I: The Return of the Envoy

synopsis:
Esther and Abel accompany Ion back to Byzantium, the capital of the Empire. 
But instead of beeing welcome with open arms, they are hunter for the murder of an important government offical.

title.jp: The Night Lords II: Twilight Of The Capital

synopsis: Abel and Asta head to the Empressâ€™ palace for the meeting in an attempt to free Ion of his bad name. Meanwhile, Ion and Esther search for Menmaru.

title.jp: The Night Lords III: The Island Of Her Darling Children

synopsis: Esther recovers from her injuries, while Ion encounters Radu.

title.jp: The Night Lords IV: The Palace Of Jade

synopsis: After recklessly charging in to kill Radu, Ion is captured along with Esther. Meanwhile, Abel and Astharoshe try to stop the assassination attempt on the Empress.

title.jp: The Night Lords V: A Start of Pilgrimage

synopsis: Dietrich makes an appearance as the person controlling Radu. Abel saves Ion and Esther and then pursues Radu. In the confrontation between Suleyman and Astharoshe, Seth comes forth as the empress and then later helps Abel defeat Radu.

title.jp: The Throne of Roses I: Kingdom of the North

synopsis: The Queen of Albion dies and her only successor was assassinated fifteen years ago. Sister Esther and the Pope visit Albion, to strengthen ties with Albion when some rebel vampires try to kidnap the The Pope.

title.jp: The Throne of Roses II: The Refuge

synopsis: The Pope takes refuge with the vampires who have been living underground and helping in Albion's prosperity. The members of AX and the rebel vampires race to find The Pope.

title.jp: The Throne of Roses III: Lord of Abyss

synopsis: Pope Alessandro is captured by Vanessa, the leader of the Rebellion but is saved Brother Petros and then Vanessa realizes her folly. Dietrich is killed by Cain, for whom he was working.

title.jp: The Crown of Thorns I: City in the Mist

synopsis: Sister Esther mourns beside a grave of Abel, when there's an attack on Albion. Virgil tells Esther that she's the Star of Hope, the one who is to lead Albion and the world to peace.

title.jp: The Crown of Thorns II: The Road of Oath

synopsis: AX and the Inquistion help take down the Orden ship attacking Albion. Esther takes her responsibility as a queen. Meanwhile Abel vows to fight Cain till the end, and Ion joins him in his journey.
